mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.user_id AS userId, a.thumbnail AS thumbnail, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM bookmark b JOIN algorithm_guide a ON b.content_id = a.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.content_type = 'algo_guide' AND a.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

SELECT s.id AS solutionId, s.title AS solutionTitle, s.runtime, s.memory, s.language_id AS languageId, u.name AS author
FROM bookmark b JOIN algorithm_problem_solution s ON b.content_id = s.id JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.content_type = 'algo_solution' AND s.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY s.created_at DESC

SELECT w.id, w.title, w.created_at AS createdAt, w.thumbnail AS thumbnail FROM bookmark b JOIN web_guide w ON b.content_id = w.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.content_type = 'web_guide' AND w.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY w.created_at DESC

SELECT r.id, r.title, r.url, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM bookmark b JOIN web_recommend r ON b.content_id = r.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.content_type = 'web_recommend' AND r.is_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO bookmark (user_id, content_type, content_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contentType}, #{contentId}, CURRENT_DATE)
